downfall:SummonMushrooms.NAME: Fungus Among Us
downfall:SummonMushrooms.DESCRIPTION: Kill all Mushrooms. Heal HP equal to their remaining HP. NL Summon two Mushrooms.

downfall:Aged.NAME: Aged
downfall:Aged.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. Ethereal. NL At the end of your turn, add a Void Status to the top of your draw pile.

downfall:Bewildered.NAME: Bewildered
downfall:Bewildered.DESCRIPTION: When you play another card, sneckomod:Muddle your hand, then discard this. NL Exhaust.

downfall:Icky.NAME: Icky
downfall:Icky.DESCRIPTION: Add a Slimed Status to your hand. NL Exhaust.

downfall:Haunted.NAME: Haunted
downfall:Haunted.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. Unplayable. NL When drawn, add Ethereal to all cards in your hand.

downfall:Malfunctioning.NAME: Flawed
downfall:Malfunctioning.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL At the end of your turn, transform all cards in hand into random Status cards. NL Exhaust.
